title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 501.4 - Utilization of existing resources
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 501.4 - Utilization of existing resources

State Regulations

Each agency in planning and administering its medical
care program shall make full and proper use of all public and private medical
and health facilities and services that are already established in the
community. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
501.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
